#labels level,format,xml

= XML Format For Composite Objects =



All the game objects inside a level are outlined inside the tag <LevelObjects> and all the rules inside the level are stored inside the <LevelRules>. Please add to this format and all the attributes that would make a good level XML.


= Details =

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<Level name="Level1">

	<SpriteGroups>
		<SpriteGroup name="playerGroup">
			<Sprite name="playerSprite" x="0" y="100" vx="10" vy="20">
				<Visual name="Player!!!" />
			</Sprite>
		</SpriteGroup>
		<SpriteGroup name="enemyGroup">
			<Sprite name="enemySprite" x="100" y="100" vx="-10" vy="-20">
				<Visual name="Enemy!!!" />
			</Sprite>
		</SpriteGroup>
	</SpriteGroups>

	<CollisionGroups>
		<CollisionGroup subclass="vooga.examples.factory.PlayerEnemyCollision">
			<SpriteGroup name="playerGroup"></SpriteGroup>
			<SpriteGroup name="enemyGroup"></SpriteGroup>
		</CollisionGroup>
	</CollisionGroups>
	
	<Background name="Background">
		<BackgroundGroup name="background1.jpg"></BackgroundGroup>
		<BackgroundGroup name="background2.jpg"></BackgroundGroup>
		<BackgroundGroup name="background3.jpg"></BackgroundGroup>
	</Background>
	
	<Music name="Background">
		<MusicGroup name="music1.midi"></MusicGroup>
		<MusicGroup name="music2.midi"></MusicGroup>
		<MusicGroup name="music3.midi"></MusicGroup>
	</Music>
</Level>
}}}
